abilities.Ink Saver (Main)\n: Decreases amount of ink consumed by your main weapon.
abilities.Special Duration Up\n: Increases usage time of special weapons.
abilities.Quick Respawn\n: Decreases respawn time after getting splatted.
abilities.Swim Speed Up\n: Increases movement speed while swimming in squid form.
abilities.Bomb Range Up\n: Makes bombs, Point Sensors, and Disruptors travel farther when thrown.
abilities.Cold-Blooded\n: Shortens the effect of attacks that let enemies track your position, such as Point Sensors.
abilities.Recon\n: Allows you to see the opposing team on the map while standing on your spawn point.
abilities.Haunt\n: Reveals the position of any player who splats you to your team for a short time.
abilities.Tenacity\n: Fills special gauge automatically if your team has fewer active players than the enemy.
abilities.Special Saver\n: Reduces special-gauge decrease after getting splatted.
abilities.Defense Up\n: Reduces damage taken from all attacks.
abilities.Last-Ditch Effort\n: Boosts ink recovery rate and weapon ink efficiency for the last 30 seconds of battle.
abilities.Ink Resistance Up\n: Reduces damage and movement penalties incurred when moving through enemy ink.
abilities.Ninja Squid\n: Leaves no trace when swimming on inked ground, but reduces swim speed slightly.
abilities.Opening Gambit\n: Boosts your speed in both inkling and squid form for the first 30 seconds of battle.
abilities.Comeback\n: Boosts some of your abilities a short time after respawning.
abilities.Stealth Jump\n: Hides your Super Jump landing points, but also makes your Super Jump slightly slower.
abilities.Damage Up\n: Increases damage of your main, sub,s and special weapons.
abilities.Ink Saver (Sub)\n: Decreases amount of ink consumed by your sub weapon.
abilities.Bomb Sniffer\n: Reveals traps and hidden bombs placed by your opponent.
abilities.Run Speed Up\n: Increases movement speed in Inkling form.
abilities.Ink Recovery Up\n: Increases ink-tank refill rate while submerged in squid form.
